title: Quiz 6 - Seating Arrangement
instruction:
Directions (21-25): Directions: Read the following information carefully and answer the questions given beside.

 

In a linear row of 8 persons from P to W, four people face towards north and four towards south. Further information is given below.

 

Q is third to the left of R, who faces (i) ______. Only S is adjacent to R. Q is on the immediate right of V, who faces north. (ii) _____ is second to the left of V and faces north. P and T are immediate neighbors, where the latter is at an extreme end. U is second to the right of Q, who faces (iii) ________. Not more than two persons facing same direction are adjacent to each other. W is on the immediate right of (iv) ______ . The immediate neighbors of P face (v) ______ direction.

quiz.text: Who among the following pairs represents the youngest and the oldest father respectively?
options: A and H
H and G
E and A
F and G
none of these

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and hence form a group. Which of the following does not belong to the group?
options: Q
T
E
B
R

quiz.text: What is the sum of the ages of N’s father and B’s child?
options: 28
32
34
38
40

quiz.text: Who among the following represent the children of C and E respectively?
options: Q and R
T and S
Q and T
T and Q
none of these

quiz.text: Who among the following are the immediate neighbors of the one, whose age is 31?
options: The one whose age is 5 and the one whose age is 7
The one whose age is 2 and the one whose age is 4
The one whose age is 7 and the one whose age is 2
The one whose age is 4 and the one whose age is 7
none of these
